mutants.code:
def calculate_max_prosperity(N, K, A):

    def kadanesmax(arr):
        maxend = arr[0]
        maxupto = arr[0]
        lmax = [arr[0]]
        for i in range(1, len(arr)):
            if maxend < 0:
                maxend = arr[i]
            else:
                maxend += arr[i]
            maxupto = max(maxupto, maxend)
            lmax.append(maxupto)
        return lmax
    subarr1 = kadanesmax(A)
    A.reverse()
    subarr2 = kadanesmax(A)
    subarr2.reverse()
    prosperity = A[0] - A[-1]
    for i in range(N - K - 1):
        year = subarr2[i + (K + 1)] + subarr1[i]
        prosperity = max(prosperity, year)
    return prosperity

        year = subarr2[i + (K + 1)] + subarr1[i]
        prosperity = max(prosperity, year)
    return prosperity

            maxupto = max(maxupto, maxend)
            lmax.append(maxupto)
        return lmax
    subarr1 = kadanesmax(A)
    A.reverse()
    subarr2 = kadanesmax(A)
    subarr2.reverse()
    prosperity = A[0] + A[-1]
    for i in range(N - K - 1):
        year = subarr2[i + (K + 1)] + subarr1[i]
        prosperity = max(prosperity, year)
    return prosperity
